notes:
Update November 17, 2012:
This scam is the 'did you authorize so and so to receive money for you'  type. Early on, the scammer writes:
Did you broker the debt. to one,of , ... to claim and receive the payment on your behalf?
It turns out that the Individual and Company named in the original version of this story do exist, and do not like being mentioned, even as innocent bystanders, so their names have been anonymized. The (anonymized) bank account cited is long closed.

The name of the Individual in a scam of this 'format' is window dressing - it's some innocent party possibly plucked from a business directory, or someone the scammer had tried to scam before - it's simply used to fill blanks in the 'format'. Sometimes it's the name of someone famous and/or conveniently dead (often in a Ghastly Plane Crash), or totally made up.

messages.body:
Rabbi Ben Zona is the mastermind and star of such adventures as A Bit of Botha, hw much will u pay me 4 a start, CIRCUMSPECTION, IF THE FALAFEL LOOK LIKE GOLD and FAMILY PLOT.


From the archives ... the Director of the Central Bank of Nigeria.


Some people must be total morons to fall for it. On the other hand, he's a bloody moron for thinking I'd fall for this despite trying to fend him off - I'm a busy scambaiter you know, lots of other more important people to see to - but I will give him that he knew when to back down rather than string it out unnecessarily...


The IP address is very similar to the scammer posing as Debbie Rowe. Either it's the same person or someone who works alongside the original. Both are likely answers as the scambaits pretty much played over the same timeframe. These people are known to share a "mugu" (a fool) among themselves. Although, I'm guessing that in any given time any Internet cafe in Nigeria has several scammers operating alongside each other anyway, so they very much may be working alongside each other but not know each other.

messages.body:
Dr. Abuli,


Let me make sure I've got my facts straight before we continue:


-  was a contractor in your part of the world, who then died. - Somehow or other it was traced to me, and you want to give me $10M.
- I have maintained that I never met a , but the bank approved the release of funds to me anyway.
- Upon my repeated insistence that the money isn't rightfully mine, you then notify me of a second contractor, Victor Zona, also met his maker, and also this has been traced to me.
- You want to give me $10M that was connected to him as well, even though I have never met him before, nor is he a family member.
- This is of no consequence to the Central Bank of Nigeria, however, as they approved the release of this second fund to me.
- Although this person is not connected with me in any way, because no one is coming for the claim, you want to give it to me anyway because I'm a "stright forward person". 


If these facts are all true, then I should have $20M coming my way. Is that right? And if this is true, how many other dead contractors in Nigeria are on your books? Why stop at $20M? Don't get me wrong, there are plenty of ways I could use $20M, and if you're willing to give it to me, I'm willing to take it. Please just verify the facts as correct before we proceed with these modalities. One thing it's not sounding is 100% risky free.


Sincerely,
Dr. Rabbi Ben Zona
Congregation Baal Tashchis soon to be retired if this is all true
